blog.description:
This is Those Guys!
Those Guys on the Radio is the podcast division of TG Productions. They are based primarily out of New York City. They strive to bring you quality content, mostly consisting of reviews and discussions of professional wrestling, anime and manga, American comic books, video games, and television shows, both animated and live action.
TG Productions also has a let's play division called Those Guys Play, where they play video games from every platform! 
Like us on Facebook!
Those Guys on the Radio
Follow us on Twitter! 
Follow @ThoseGuysRadio
And like us on Instagram!

blog.name: gendermarie
blog.title: haunted ship, Sea Marie
blog.description: sea/crindy!! 27. trans. they/them/theirs or he/him/his unless otherwise specified. physically disabled. autistic. ADHD-riddled + traumatized. all I do is write about D&D elves. if you like my fics, reblogs go a long way! also notcrindy on AO3. icon by bonesbunns!!

tags: I'm way too into this oh well
summary: hi so today I finally figured out my Rymesona basically just me, Sea Marie, who got around mostly w ppl assistance as a young...
body:
hi so today I finally figured out my Rymesona

basically just me, Sea Marie, who got around mostly w ppl assistance as a young kid in a walker (n sometimes wheelchair), but then was traumatized at 12 and got a therapy Ralts!! I named her Devi after Devi D. from “JtHM” (bc that is what I would’ve done at twelve 9_9;) and was v hesitant n weird abt the whole thing  in universe but since then I’ve totally bonded w her and she’s my best friend and daughter. she helps me get around w psychic powers, do household chores, manage trauma, autistic meltdowns and emotions, and protects me!!!!!!

im so proud I always knew I would find the perfect Pokemon for me :D now she is a Kirlia and I’m starting to branch out n go to therapy and discover myself, just like in real life!! if only I could draw…

summary: Pokemon Detective Pikachu: Better Than Expected
title: Pokemon Detective Pikachu: Better Than Expected
body:
There’s been a long and uneasy relationship between video games and movies. Whether it’s a major film getting a video game spin-off, or a theatrical adaptation of a famous game franchise, the overall outcome has always been… underwhelming. And with tensions high from the live action Sonic trailer, the idea of a live action Pokémon movie sounds unnerving in concept.

So when I walked into the dimly lit theater to catch the 3:20 showing of Pokémon Detective Pikachu, I was nervous. I’ve been a fan of Pokémon since the release of Pokémon Red and Blue on the original Game Boy. I was steeling myself for a childish and awkward movie with ugly creatures flailing about on screen.

It was a huge sigh of relief to leave the theater hoping they’d make another one.

Read More

summary: A Life-Size Detective Pikachu Plush hits Japan this year  Want your very own life-size Detective Pikachu? Well, there’s one...
caption:
A Life-Size Detective Pikachu Plush hits Japan this year

Want your very own life-size Detective Pikachu? Well, there’s one releasing in Japan, following the success of the movie, during December 2019. The replica will cost you upwards of 21,780 yen or around $200.

Pre-orders are taking place now so, you can get yours here.

BUY: Detective Pikachu 8 inch/20 cm Plush ($24)
